mapper.select: SELECT CI.CRCLM_CD, CONCAT(CI.CRCLM_YEAR,'ë…„') AS CRCLM_YEAR, CodeFind('0018', CI.CRCLM_HALF) AS CRCLM_HALF, CI.CRCLM_NM AS CRCLM_NM FROM APPL_INFO AI JOIN CRCLM_INFO CI ON AI.CRCLM_CD = CI.CRCLM_CD AND AI.CRCLM_YEAR = CI.CRCLM_YEAR AND AI.CRCLM_HALF = CI.CRCLM_HALF WHERE AI.STDNT_NO = #{id }

SELECT AC.CRCLM_CD, AC.CRCLM_YEAR, AC.CRCLM_HALF, AC.SBJCT_NO, aslv.SBJCT_NM, aslv.ESNTL_YN, aslv.KORN_FLNM, aslv.cls_dayhour, aslv.ROOM_NM FROM APPL_CLS AC JOIN atndSbjctListView aslv ON AC.CRCLM_CD = aslv.CRCLM_CD AND AC.CRCLM_YEAR = aslv.CRCLM_YEAR AND AC.CRCLM_HALF = aslv.CRCLM_HALF AND AC.SBJCT_NO = aslv.SBJCT_NO WHERE AC.STDNT_NO = #{id }
AND aslv.SBJCT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchSbjct },'%')

SELECT CRCLM_CD, CRCLM_YEAR, CRCLM_HALF, SBJCT_NO, STDNT_NO, (CONCAT(SUBSTR(LECT_YMD, 5, 2), '.', SUBSTR(LECT_YMD, 7, 2))) AS LECT_YMD , CodeFind('0017', CLS_CD) AS CLS_KORN, CodeFind('0014', ATND_CD) AS ATND_KORN, RMRK FROM APPL_ATND WHERE STDNT_NO = #{id } ORDER BY LECT_YMD
